title: Hooker4life
author: Hooker4life
content: I’ve got around 1600 pi and am looking to trade for Litecoin or other coins. If interested send me a PM

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Isn't that a worthless wannabe token?

comments.author: Maasdamer
comments.body: "Pi Network has faced its fair share of controversy recently. Please do your own research before investing."https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/pinetwork/

comments.author: miner29
comments.body: Yup value is currently $0.00….see all the coin sites, coinmarketcap, coingecko, etc….no exchange shows any value either….so worthless.

comments.author: Jeger.Kiting
comments.body: The Pi Network has no value in any exchange, so what do you expect by selling the Pi here, as a lot of people say the Pi Network is a form of project scam. So keep the Pi you have and think of it as a memento you have with those damn coins. The Pi you offer will not attract people who buy it because the coin is worthless and will be a display in your wallet.

comments.author: arwin100
comments.body: Quote from: Hooker4life on September 21, 2022, 11:12:10 AMI’ve got around 1600 pi and am looking to trade for Litecoin or other coins. If interested send me a PMDo you think there are people here will trade your worthless pi to litecoin? If you are been hype on what you see in social media where they post about getting wealthy if you participate on task or trading with pi then you cannot do it on coins with actual value. And those people who just hype you about pi is just taking advantage on newbie people so I strongly believe that no one will trade that coin to any top coins here.

comments.author: entebah
comments.body: Quote from: Hooker4life on September 21, 2022, 11:12:10 AMI’ve got around 1600 pi and am looking to trade for Litecoin or other coins. If interested send me a PMi believe that this coins holder is full of dreams because they have a Consensus that the price of PI will be 314000$which is impossible because it's almost 17x the price of bitcoin

comments.author: goinmerry
comments.body: Quote from: Hooker4life on September 21, 2022, 11:12:10 AMI’ve got around 1600 pi and am looking to trade for Litecoin or other coins. If interested send me a PMPI believers have a wonderful expectations about the future of this coin. So much promising that I can't even understand how it can possibly to happened. Without a real market price, I doubt someone will be interested in your offer.I heard that there's an own marketplace designated for PI users. I'm not just sure if it's real. Why not look for it instead and do some transactions there? Although I'm very sure that almost everyone there wants to dispose of their PI.

comments.author: batang_bitcoin
comments.body: I guess only Pi believers would take that deal. But for us that don't see anything significant with this project, we would likely just feel that it's a worthless token and sorry about that OP and those folks that are still believing that someday this token will have any value.OP, look to those believers that are on groups in social media, maybe you'll find the right person that will accept this deal.
